## ğŸ“Š Tabela Z interativa

```{r}
linhas <- seq(0.0, 3.9, by = 0.1)
colunas <- seq(0.00, 0.09, by = 0.01)

tabela_z <- data.frame(z = linhas)

for (c in colunas) {
  tabela_z[[sprintf("%.2f", c)]] <- round(pnorm(linhas + c), 4)
}

datatable(
  tabela_z,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 10,
    scrollX = TRUE,
    searching = TRUE
  ),
  rownames = FALSE
)
```
